steps: Offered callback/AI help after queue timeout
failure_detail: Agent cannot process timeshare sales and no live representatives were available to take the transfer.

policy_gap.blocker: Out of scope for AI and no human agents available

loops.subject: selling timeshare
loops.note: Repeatedly asking for explanation of intent

summary: The customer wanted to sell their timeshare ownership entirely. The AI attempted to clarify the request but ultimately could not help as the task is out of scope and no live representatives were available after a long hold.
verbatim: Instead of ownership entirely. ... You just saw it out right. ... You can't help.
coaching: The agent should have recognized 'sell ownership entirely' as an out-of-scope request immediately and transitioned to the transfer/callback flow rather than looping on intent clarification.
